sentences.english: Migratory songs wing from my heart and seek their nests in your voice od love.
sentences.chinese: 飄泊的歌兒從我心中飛去在你愛的呼聲裏尋找窠巢。

sentences.english: Homes, is that this group of urban rover ultimate desire.
sentences.chinese: 家園，是這一羣都市飄泊者的最終渴望。

sentences.english: I am a lonely fox wondering solely around.
The boat drifted on the lake.
Who knows to where that person had wandered?
sentences.chinese: 誰知道人面飄泊何處去？

sentences.english: He left for Rome again yesterday. He is usually a bird of passage.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天又去羅馬了，他是一個飄泊不定的人。

sentences.english: End of the World traces a pot of rover Ruhou hard, you go after the wine warm memories of lean thinking.
sentences.chinese: 一壺飄泊浪跡天涯難入喉，你走之後酒暖回憶思念瘦。

sentences.english: Those who live in other places go back to their hometown for Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 春節前夕，飄泊異鄉的遊子們都紛紛返歸家園。

sentences.english: This AE86 was made by Masa Ito from Team Arai RC Drifters.
sentences.chinese: 這AE86是由瑪莎伊藤由鋼筋混凝土井隊飄泊。

definition: homeless and miserable/forced to leave home and wander from place to place/to live as a refugee
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
foreign land/a place far from home
foreign land/away from one's native place
to regard the four corners of the world all as home (idiom)/to feel at home anywhere/to roam about unconstrained/to consider the entire country, or world, to be one's own
person living or traveling far from home
